statements: UPDATE chatbot_interactions SET response = 'Hello, how can I help you?' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE chatbot_interactions SET message = 'Can you provide more information?' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE chatbot_interactions SET response = 'I am glad you found it helpful!' WHERE user_id = 123 AND interaction_time > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE chatbot_interactions SET message = 'Hi, how can I assist you today?' WHERE interaction_id = 456 AND user_id = 789;
UPDATE UserInteractions SET message = 'Hello World' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE Responses SET confidence = 0.85, response_message = 'I'm doing well, thank you' WHERE bot_id = '654e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE UserInteractions SET message = 'Updated message', timestamp = now() WHERE interaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Responses SET response_message = 'New response message', confidence = 0.85, timestamp = now() WHERE response_id = 'a7b69fde-ee6e-49e6-a5e3-085acedd30cb';
UPDATE chatbot_users SET user_name = 'Alice', last_interaction = '2022-09-15 12:30:00' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE chatbot_messages SET message_text = 'Hello, how can I help you?', time_sent = '2022-09-16 10:15:00' WHERE message_id = 2;
UPDATE chatbot_users SET user_name = 'Alice', last_interaction = NOW() WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE chatbot_messages SET time_sent = '2022-12-31 23:59:59', message_text = 'Goodbye!' WHERE message_id = 5;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_text = 'New interaction text' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE chatbot_performance SET performance_rating = 5, response_id = 3 WHERE performance_id = 2;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_text = 'Updated interaction text', interaction_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE chatbot_responses SET response_text = 'New response text', response_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE response_id = 456;
UPDATE ConversationHistory SET message = 'Updated message' WHERE user_id = 1 AND chatbot_id = 1
UPDATE UserPreferences SET theme = 'Dark Theme', language = 'Spanish' WHERE user_id = 2
UPDATE ConversationHistory SET message = 'New message updated' WHERE user_id = 1 AND chatbot_id = 1;
UPDATE ChatbotResponses SET response = 'Updated response text' WHERE chatbot_id = 2 AND response_id = 3;
